body:
I know that there are a lot of people who really dislike BajanCanadian, and a lot who think he is a god of sorts...
So I quickly went onto his server today to see how people react to me insulting BajanCanadian.
*Warning : NEVER UPSET A BAJAN FAN*





After that, I got kicked by a mod for "Disrespect Towards The Owner".

Don't upset a Bajan fan...
